bill_title: exempt religious organizations from sales and use taxes.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to exempt religious organizations from sales and use taxes. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 10-45 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: There are hereby exempted from the provisions of this chapter and from the computation of the tax imposed by it, the gross receipts from the sale of tangible personal property or services to any religious organization. Section 2. That chapter 10-46 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The use of tangible personal property or services by any religious organization is hereby exempted from the provisions of this chapter and from the computation of the tax imposed by it. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.038 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
